content: दिग्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [दिह्-क्त] {@--1@} Smeared, anointed, daubed; हस्तावसृग्दिग्धौ <ls>Ms. 3. 132</ls>; <ls>R. 16. 15</ls>; दिग्धोऽमृतेन च विषेण च पक्ष्मलाक्ष्या गाढं निखात इव मे हृदये कटाक्षः <ls>Māl. 1. 29.</ls> {@--2@} Soiled, defiled, polluted. {@--3@} Poisoned, envenomed; <ls>Ku. 4. 25.</ls> --ग्धः {@--1@} Oil, ointment. {@--2@} Any oily substance or unguent. {@--3@} Fire. {@--4@} A poisoned arrow. {@--5@} A story (true or fictitious.)
